CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(FirstName ) , ISBLANK(LastName ) , ISBLANK(MailingStreet ), ISBLANK(MailingState), Is_Default_First_Name__c, Is_Default_Last_Name__c , Is_Default_Address__c) , null, MID( FirstName , 0, 1) & MID( LastName ,0, 3) & MailingStreet & MailingState)
CustomField.label: FLAS
